structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text: An extension board may be created by the fiscal court of the county in which the extension district is located. The extension board, as the governing body of the extension council, shall be composed of the county judge/executive and six (6) other citizens residing within the extension district.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 20, sec. 6, effective January 2, 1978. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 275, sec. 6.
